item.title: FTB Stoneblock 2
item.description: Note This list is current as of the time of writing this but might not always be up-to-date. Take advice here with that knoweldge. Important Rules Our Stoneblock 2 server has some additional rules on the server apart from the global rules you find on all our servers. Max 2 Imaginary Time Blocks. This applies per team/base/area. Max 2 Growth Crystals. This applies per team/base/area. Cows and Chickens Cows and Chickens must always be in their respective pens.
